name: In Memory (itch)
description:
''In Memory'' was my first project I worked on, and a very short platformer made as a dedication to my mother. Drawn using traditional drawing technique, with pencil and pen on paper.
Nominee for Game of the Year in it's category,  at TIGA Games Industry Awards 2016 in London.

You can follow me on Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/crobbitarts/...
